P0=ISend(0,123,751324448);Recv(0,123);ISend(0,123,751652160);Recv(0,123);ISend(1,123,751808384);Recv(*,123);ISend(1,123,752147968);Recv(*,*);Wait(751324448);Wait(751652160);Wait(751808384);Recv(1,567);ISend(1,234,753050304);Recv(1,123);Recv(1,123);Barrier;
P1=ISend(1,123,751359808);Recv(1,123);ISend(1,123,751506048);Recv(1,123);ISend(0,123,751965120);Recv(*,123);ISend(0,123,752330176);Recv(*,*);Wait(751359808);Wait(751506048);Wait(751965120);ISend(0,567,752907648);Recv(0,234);ISend(0,123,753205632);ISend(0,123,753211584);Barrier;
